We are ready to give you 20% for all your assistance then me and my colleagues will keep 80% lf you are willing kindly reply to my letter for further directive. we will want to invest our share  into Real-estate and air taxi business in your country with your assistance,bearing in mind that confidentiality is of great essences  so is time in this project I will await your response.
